title: Getting sentimental with scent, featuring Ty Burrell
description:
Love is a fragrance you won’t soon forget.

The scent loved by millions. Gain® Flings! laundry detergent pacs have 50% more scent you love*  (*vs. Gain Liquid).  Gain® Flings! are the best Gain® yet, with amazing scent that lasts and lasts.

asset.author: Gain

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Why am I so devastated - ly handsome? I'm in a fragrance ad and my sweetheart's gone sayonara. This scarf all that's left to remember - What!? She wore this like a month ago! How's a guy supposed to move on?! 

The long lasting scent of gain flakes.
